name: Dice Rumble (Fergal MECHIN, Chloii, Jérémy Hoarau)
name_original: Dice Rumble (Fergal MECHIN, Chloii, Jérémy Hoarau)
description:
Play with a friend!

Roll to your ennemies to kill them with your high scores.

There are 5 types of dices :

- Fire : Every time you land 6, you stack a flame up. Every time you hit an other dice, your damage is increased by the number of flames you stacked and it then gets reset.
- Water : Heal every other dice in your team but yourself when you land a 6.
- Plant : Every time you land 6, you stack a liana up. When you hit an other dice, you root him for as many rounds as you had lianas.
- Rock : You increase your shield every time you land 6.
- Poison : You let a mark on every opponent you hit. When you land 6, you hit all these enemies at once wherever they are.

At the end of each turn, dices next to each other will fight. The damage dealt depends on the difference of score between the two dices. The score is determined by the top face of the dice, if it is the attacker, its score is multiplied by 2.

This game has been made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 !
